alert.note: Alert for Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Orange County through 400 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orlando Executive Airport, or over College Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Winter Park, Maitland, Windermere and Bay Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
